LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Revolutionizing the way we trade surplus food.
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Our platform connects businesses with charities to donate excess inventory and prevent food waste while nourishing those in need.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Our platform facilitates safe and transparent trading of surplus food items between individuals, businesses, and organizations.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Help minimize food waste by giving your excess food a second life through our easy-to-use marketplace.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Connect with like-minded individuals and groups committed to sustainable food practices and fighting hunger.
FEATURE_4_BODY: All food listings undergo strict quality checks to ensure freshness and safety for trade.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Choose from convenient pickup locations or arrange for delivery to suit your needs.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Reduce your carbon footprint by repurposing surplus food and minimizing unnecessary waste.
HERO_TEXT_BEFORE_TITLE: Revolutionizing the way we consume food
HERO_SUBTITLE: Connect with local farmers, reduce waste, support communities
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have a question or want to collaborate? Fill out the form below.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is a used food trading platform?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: A used food trading platform is an online marketplace that allows individuals and businesses to buy and sell surplus or unused food items. This helps reduce food waste by giving these items a second life instead of being thrown away.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Sellers can list their unused food items on the platform with descriptions, photos, and pricing. Buyers can browse listings and purchase items they are interested in, facilitating peer-to-peer transactions.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kinds of foods can be traded?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: The platform typically allows trading of non-perishable foods, canned goods, dry goods, and sometimes even fresh produce or prepared meals that are still within their expiry dates.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is it safe to buy used food?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, the platform has strict guidelines on food safety and quality. Sellers must provide accurate details on expiry dates and storage conditions. Buyers can also leave reviews on their experiences.
CTA_BODY: Join our community of conscious eaters and help reduce food waste. Trade your surplus food items with neighbors for something new and delicious.
CTA_SUBTITLE: Fight Food Waste, One Trade at a Time
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our used food trading platform
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is a used food trading platform?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our platform allows businesses and individuals to buy and sell surplus or leftover food items that would otherwise go to waste. This helps reduce food waste and provides an affordable source of food.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Sellers can list their surplus food items with descriptions, photos, and pricing. Buyers can browse listings and purchase items for pickup or delivery. All transactions are securely handled through the platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What kinds of foods can be traded?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Most non-perishable and some perishable food items are allowed, such as packaged goods, produce, baked items, and prepared meals. However, we have strict quality guidelines to ensure food safety.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is it safe to buy used food?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, all listings go through a vetting process, and sellers must follow our food handling guidelines. Buyers can also leave ratings and reviews to help build trust within the community.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: What are the benefits of using the platform?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: For sellers, it's a way to recoup costs on surplus inventory. For buyers, it provides access to affordable food options. Overall, it helps reduce the staggering amount of edible food that goes to waste each year.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Our platform connects sellers with excess inventory to buyers looking for discounted food items, preventing perfectly good food from going to waste.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Join our network of conscious consumers and businesses committed to sustainability. Trade, share tips, and make a positive impact together.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Enjoy amazing deals on quality food items nearing their expiration dates. Save money while doing your part for the environment.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: FoodSwap is a community platform that connects neighbors to trade extra food items. Our mission is to reduce food waste by facilitating local exchanges of fresh produce, leftovers, and surplus meals. Join us in building a more sustainable food ecosystem!
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Updated on Fresh Produce Deals
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from people using our platform to trade surplus food
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has been a gamechanger for my restaurant. We've drastically reduced food waste and found a way to make extra income from surplus ingredients.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a food bank, we're always looking for sources of fresh produce. This platform connects us directly with businesses that have excess food to donate.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love being able to browse and buy quality ingredients from local restaurants and grocery stores at a discounted rate. It's sustainable and saves me money!
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Day-old bread, a little dried out but still edible.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Pizza from 2 days ago, cold but the toppings are still good.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Apples with some bruising but crisp inside.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Prewashed salad greens, a bit wilted but still crunchy.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Yogurt cups just past the expiration date.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Overripe bananas, perfect for baking banana bread.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Connecting buyers and sellers of quality used food items.
